title: Ella Eyre shares stunning throwback snap of herself wearing yellow bikini
text:
The nation has been lamenting the lack of sunshine singer Ella Eyre feels just the same, it seems.

The 25-year-old shared a throwback picture of herself from a holiday destination taken in the summer and she looked incredible in a yellow bikini.

Her two-piece was made up of a yellow bandeau top and matching bottoms and she wore a pair of sunglasses with canary coloured frames.

Mellow yellow: Ella Eyre has shared a stunning throwback snap of herself wearing a yellow bikini as she laments the 's*** weather' in the UK at the moment

She captioned the image with the words: 'Hi friends happy monday here’s a throwback coz the weathers s*** and so is social media.' [sic].

In April, Ella spoke exclusively to MailOnline about the secrets to her confidence, and also delightedly dished more details on her low-key relationship.

Speaking at the The Ivy Spinningfields, Manchester Super Party, she said: 'My confidence comes from my mum.

Ella previously said: 'My mum is very driven and has always kept me busy… She used to say to me: "Nobody likes a teenager. So use your teenage years to work'

'She has balls of steel and instilled that in me from a young age!'

Ella once told The Guardian about some of the advice her mother gave her.

She said: 'My mum is very driven and has always kept me busy… She used to say to me: "Nobody likes a teenager. So use your teenage years to work.

'"Then enjoy your life when you're slightly older."'

She said she was enjoying the variety of what a life in the spotlight brings.

'I wake up every morning and life is different,' she said. 'I've got a gig or a shoot. Flying here, flying there. Meeting wicked people. Going to amazing places. I'm relishing it.'

Meanwhile, Ella likes to keep her love life to herself and previously said: 'I don't feel the need to flaunt our relationship. He's in the music industry and he gets it.

'It's great to be with someone who isn't interested in the limelight and who just supports what I do.'
description: The nation has been lamenting the lack of sunshine  singer Ella Eyre feels just the same, it seems.
